file_content.text: [This appears to be another datapad belonging to the first Republic explorers of Voss.]
That confirms it, those natives are after our tech. Too smart to be just savages.
I'm a walking target with all the equipment I'm carrying. I don't care what Janney says, I'm not losing an arm for this.
Next time I even smell one of those natives, I'm hiding my gear. I picked out a spot, under a little sapling. Everything will be safe there.
